descriptionHtml:
I didn't like how Vilja's face looked in Skyrim in comparison to Oblivion, so I set out to find a face mod for her. Unfortunately, the only ones I found were the ones on her page, and I didn't really like those either, so I let it be for a few months. One day while casually strolling the internet, I stumbled upon a guide on how to make a custom face for her from save data, which can be found by googling "Guide to customizing Vilja"


However, I decided to upload the version of Vilja I made, just in case anybody is interested in it or if anybody doesn't want to go through the hassle of creating another character just for Vilja.Â 

Requirements:
Vilja in Skyrim
Apachii Skyhair, the female add-on pack

Installation:
Just put the meshes and textures folders inside Skyrim/Data

Compatibility:
Not compatible with any mod that changes Vilja's face, obviously.

Known Issues:
She has a neck seam issue, but it's very small and I didn't see fit to go and fix it since I liked the color of the new face.
author: Nath Maghinay
